nodes.bodyText:
resolves
JavadocPropertiesGeneratorTest.testNonExistentArgument:111 Unexpected error log ==> expected: <Missing required options and parameters: '--destfile=<outputFile>', '<inputFile>'08:59
Usage: java com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.JavadocPropertiesGenerator [-hV]08:59
      --destfile=<outputFile> <inputFile>08:59
     <inputFile>   The input file.08:59
     --destfile=<outputFile>08:59
                   The output file.08:59
 -h, --help        Show this help message and exit.08:59
 -V, --version     Print version information and exit.08:59
> but was: <Missing required parameter: '<inputFile>'08:59
Usage: java com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.JavadocPropertiesGenerator [-hV]08:59
      --destfile=<outputFile> <inputFile>08:59
     <inputFile>   The input file.08:59
     --destfile=<outputFile>08:59
                   The output file.08:59
 -h, --help        Show this help message and exit.08:59
 -V, --version     Print version information and exit.08:59
>
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -88,7 +88,8 @@ eclipse-static-analysis)
   ;;
 
 nondex)
-  mvn -e --fail-never clean nondex:nondex -DargLine='-Xms1024m -Xmx2048m'
+  mvn -e --fail-never clean nondex:nondex -DargLine='-Xms1024m -Xmx2048m' \
+    -Dtest=!JavadocPropertiesGeneratorTest#testNonExistentArgument

nodes.bodyText: This error was likely caused by the picocli library; this is probably why the nondex report failed to generate a file for this, and why we must exclude instead of fixing violations.

+    -Dtest=!JavadocPropertiesGeneratorTest#testNonExistentArgument

nodes.bodyText: Please add this reason as a short comment to the script file.

nodes.bodyText:
This now causes a pitest failure. https://app.circleci.com/pipelines/github/checkstyle/checkstyle/4214/workflows/227adf91-df2d-4285-8fda-f24cbd7c8afa/jobs/69854 +FileContents.java.html:
            if (hasIntersection) {

all changes in this file resolve AllChecksTest.testAllCheckTokensAreReferencedInGoogleConfigFile:394->validateAllCheckTokensAreReferencedInConfigFile:451->validateDefaultTokens:479 All default tokens should be used in config for Indentation
If the other changes resolve #9083 (comment) , then why are these changes needed?
They are not, thanks for catching that. Fixed.
